ANU.name: Mahomed Said Patel
expertise: Public Health And Health Services Not Elsewhere Classified
ANU.biography: I have worked with the Global Outbreak, Alert and Response Network in various capacities: as Team Leader for Preparedness and then for Response to the SARS outbreak in 2003 at the WHO Office in Manila, as member of the WHO team that evaluated China’s response to its first outbreak of avian influenza in humans in 2005, and as team support member for controlling the cholera outbreak in South Sudan 2014.
